Is Alice's generalization about ticket scalpers at every Pistons game a valid inference from her experience?
No, it is not a valid inference because she only has experience with Pistons games and not other NBA games or sporting events.

Generalizing from that sample, he infers that 79% of students are dissatisfied with their high school experience. He is surprised and saddened by the result.
